item.title: Writer / Blogger
item.dc:creator: @aletha
item.description:
@aletha wrote:

Anyone here fancy themselves as the next Wordsworth or just simply like to blog now and again? We’re after some talented writers to join the Bitbay team, yes that’s right we are expanding AGAIN!

Ideally you’d have solid crypto/blockchain knowledge and will already be familiar with Bitbay.market.

We are looking for someone who can grasp technical concepts as well as write in layman’s terms to a wider audience.

If interested, please get in touch with a covernote explaining why you think you’re a good fit fo the role, your current knowledge of Bitbay and of crypto projects in general and your CV. aletha@bitbay.market

item.title: Senior SEO Specialist / Manager **POSITION FILLED**
item.dc:creator: @aletha
item.description:
@aletha wrote:

Senior SEO Specialist / Manager - ideally full time but can consider part time too

Bitbay is looking for an experienced Specialist / Manager to join our Social Media and Web team.

The approach is to lead with insight driven strategies brought to life by content/experience opportunities and strong technical backbone. Although client websites/apps and digital experiences are the key focus areas, this role is also encouraged to provide strategies and recommendations that demonstrate a deep understanding of Bitbay’s overall offerings. You will own the definition and execution of search strategies including performance tracking, continual optimization and improvement.

Responsibilities:
• Own the development and execution of search driven strategies
• While focusing primarily on searcher behaviour, also leverage a wide range of additional research sources to find key insights and then communicate them effectively to the wider teams
• Demonstrate knowledge and utilization of advanced productivity and automation concepts to reduce time spent gathering data while maximizing development of insights and strategies
• Define search driven guidelines around page content, mobile friendliness, site architecture, URL structure, page titles, meta descriptions, headings, schema markup, page speed, anchor text, internal linking, site maps, etc.
• Create content strategies in collaboration with the working team that leverage professional and user generated content to maximize return
• Combine paid search and organic search data when available to reduce costs while maximizing key business activities
• Ability to review existing site content, structure and technology and provide optimization recommendations.
• Define search requirements and provide direction to copywriters, designers and engineers while quality checking implementation.
• Develop a framework and reports to systematically track and improve search performance
• Stay up-to-date with changes in how search engines measure authority
• Advise on website development tweaks to manage migrations while maximizing search visibility: for example, redirects, error pages, use of JavaScript/AJAX
• Content development best practices.
Requirements:
• Solid SEO experience– ideally with multiple websites.
• Demonstrated achievements in systematically improving search rankings that translated into traffic growth and improved site conversion.
• Deep understanding of website personalization, automation and the search impacts of each and how to mitigate
• Strong knowledge of the cryptosphere/blockchain related projects.
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
• In depth knowledge of user experience concepts
• Strong technical understanding as it relates to early SEO in the web development process, and the ability to work in partnership with a development team.
• Very strong analytical skills with a demonstrated ability to leverage multiple data sources to inform decision-making.
• Systematic approach to identifying opportunities/issues, defining solutions and executing action plans.
• Great attention to detail combined with the ability to prioritize and meet aggressive targets and deadlines.
• Passion for staying current in a rapidly evolving environment and leveraging tools and online forums to gain a competitive edge.
• Be able to adapt to changing consumer behavior and emerging trends changing on a daily basis.

please email your CV to aletha@bitbay.market our Recruitment Manager.

item.title: Market Research Analyst
item.dc:creator: @aletha
item.description:
@aletha wrote:

Market Research Analyst – exciting opportunity to work across a diverse platform / user base and carve out “market research techniques” in the cryptosphere!

Full or part time REMOTE work.

Bitbay is looking to hire someone who loves conducting market research and user surveys!
Ideally this will be creative analysis of qualitative eCommerce consumer and Crypto investor research strategies.
The successful candidate will work closely with the Marketing Manager and Social Media Team.
Bitbay offers a very diverse range of “use cases” from buying/selling to transferring Fiat to Crypto to setting up a trust fund to conducting contract/employment services
The use cases need in depth analysis to maximise the adoption and benefit to our investors and users.
The position of Market Research Analyst will be highly varied and highly autonomous giving you scope to design your own research methods, surveys, polls, in a wide range of mediums – using social media such as twitter, facebook as well as communities such as slack groups, face to face seminars etc.
Ideally we are looking for someone to have an established track record in designing, carrying out and managing social research. Management of complex research projects which involve a range of people, cultures, communities, buyers/sellers, businesses and disciplines. Strong analytical background, with experience of survey design, delivery and analysis. Strong communication skills and experience of collaborative working. Development of clear, pragmatic and manageable delivery plans using project management skills. Be self-motivated and comfortable working at pace.

please email your CV to aletha@bitbay.market our Recruitment Manager.

item.title: Marketing Manager / Head of Marketing
item.dc:creator: @aletha
item.description:
@aletha wrote:

Marketing Manager / Head of Marketing REMOTE WORK around your day job! £negotiable

Do you have an interest in blockchain, bitcoin, Ethereum related projects, alt-coin, cryptocurrencies and are looking for remote work around your day job? If the Answer is yes, then my client would love to hear from you! Pay is negotiable

We are looking for a Head of Marketing with an interest in Blockchain technology to lead, motivate and manage a team of marketing and communications professionals in the testing, creation, management, delivery and review of key marketing campaigns within agreed strategies, plans and budgets.

  • To help lead on the development of integrated strategies and plans, ensuring that the team capitalize on every opportunity to build brand, raise awareness, deepen understanding, drive action and grow awareness/user interaction with the software and currency.

Coordinating with the Art Director and IT Development team, you will help lead the brand creative development to lead the rebrand and continued development of the brand throughout the transformation programme and all the marketing activity.

You will need to develop strategies to target investors and users of a blockchain / cryptocurrency software platform. Both are very unique target markets so the Head of Marketing will need to devise strategies in collaboration with other internal teams such as Web development/SEO/Social Media on how to gather market data for analysis and from this, create and devise specific plans.

You will ideally have an interest in blockchain, bitcoin, Ethereum related projects, alt-coin, cryptocurrencies and will be comfortable adding structure to unstructured teams.

The team are global and are all remote workers so this role will involve heavy use of tools such as slack, gsuite, Asana, Skype for regular communication with the team.
Other responsibilities will include:

• Working on low budget projects - Manage and control budget and review performance
• Lead media agency selection for PR
• Develop marketing activity with the commercial team including promotional plans and launches

You will need:

• To be a marketing professional with strong brand and advertising leadership experience Ideally with a mixture of B2B, B2C or C2C experience.
• The ability to translate customer insight into clear and compelling customer messages and communication
• The ability to join up multiple strands of activity to land in the market at the same time for maximum impact in terms of impact, influence, and ultimately sales
• To be highly commercially aware
• Excellent understanding of all elements of the marketing mix and the role of brand, advertising, and visual communications within this
• Strong commercial and numerical analytical skills

please email your CV to aletha@bitbay.market our Recruitment Manager.

item.dc:creator: @aletha
item.description:
@aletha wrote:

I am pleased to announce this position has been filled!

Full Stack Python developer OR Front end PYQT GUI

REMOTE WORK in your spare time from your HOME – pay is negotiable

This role can be undertaken remotely so it doesn’t matter where in the world you are based. As long as you have transferable technical skills and a good internet connection please feel free to apply.

Front End developer / UI (User Interface) Python/PyQt or C++ Developer / Programmer / Software Engineer with interest in cryptography and peer to peer networks

We are interested in finding and training a few cryptocurrency developers or people who want to be more familiar with the field. Bitbay has been established for several years and has one of the world’s top developers working on our software.

We are the first company to offer decentralized peer to peer serverless markets and unbreakable contracts in a full-fledged contracting platform.

• The tasks would vary but would include redevelopment/ re-skinning our desktop application.

It would be helpful if you have a background in peer to peer networking, cryptography, network programming or security. It would be nice if you were familiar with design and UI/UX development.
Working remotely, you will have to file reports on your progress and work in a fast and concise manner. You will also be able to learn a lot about the field and some of the secrets of the trade from one of the top cryptocurrency developers.

You will also be able to take part in a very large collaborative team effort and this will help you hone in on your skills.

Graphics Designer -remote/home - Am Pleased to Announce this position has now been filled.

Want to learn about Blockchain, crytocurrency/digital currencies/Alt-coins similar to Bitcoin, ethereum but can’t get a foot in due to lack of experience? Then this may be the perfect opportunity if you can spare some free time working on live projects in return for hands-on learning around your schedule?

Adobe illustrator / Photoshop / Indesign

Bitbay have been around for several years and have one of the world’s top developers working on our software. We have a very active, friendly slack community where you will bounce off the core team as well as investors.

Build 20-30 graphics at the relevant size for social media use – Twitter, Facebook etc. They will provide a spreadsheet with the content and the graphic assets.

You will also be able to take part in a very large collaborative team effort and this will help you hone in on your skills and of course, you will end up with an excellent portfolio of work to reference on your CV and make yourself more employable for future work in the blockchain space from larger firms.

item.title: Social Media Analyst **POSITION FILLED**
item.dc:creator: @aletha
item.description:
@aletha wrote:

Social Media Analyst – part time – REMOTE WORK FROM HOME!

Do you love social media? Have new and exciting ideas to boost a company’s engagement and improve their channels? Love creating content and engaging with followers?

Do you also have an interest in blockchain, bitcoin, Ethereum related projects, alt-coin, cryptocurrencies? If so, then please read on!

Bitbay is looking for a highly creative and energetic individual who is addicted to social media and has experience in managing social media accounts, to join the global team. You’ll be on the frontline of our content strategies, creating and posting content on all of the social media platforms. You’ll have a strong understanding of current trends in the social media sphere with a very strong sense of aesthetics and style.
This role provides tremendous opportunities for the right candidate: to capture the energy and rapid pace of a fast growing cryptocurrency provider while being responsible for a sizeable and growing part of their global footprint.
Responsibilities

• Develop social media strategies by planning, researching and creating highly engaging content that targets global audiences across various social media channels (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube)
• Conceptualise and execute innovative social media campaigns and competitions to drive awareness and engagement
• Track and monitor daily account activities (including growth, engagement etc.) and performance of campaigns
• Monitor and listen to online conversation within company’s social media channels; respond to questions of followers and make strategic suggestions based on this conversation
• Conceive and develop efficient and intuitive marketing campaigns with influencers/brand ambassadors to gain maximum exposure for the brand via various online platforms
• Work within a variety of social media management tools and content management system for scheduling and publish content on a global scale
• Work with our design team to create unique and engaging content
Required Skills/Knowledge/Experience:

• Must have an excellent eye for great pictures and a strong sense of aesthetics
• Enthusiastic content creator on social media
• Active profiles on a minimum of two social media channels
• Ability to commit to the role for at least three months, preferably six with the option to extend
• Excellent writing and communications skills
• Positive attitude, willingness to go the extra mile
• Having your own blog and WordPress knowledge will be a plus
• Photoshop experience also a bonus!
In return you will get:

• Bonuses paid in cryptocurrency
• Invaluable insight into the world of a highly innovative blockchain company
• Excellent experience coordinating with global teams, heads of departments and creative divisions.
